alert.note: Alert for Converse County Lower Elevations; North Laramie Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 1:02PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Albany and southwestern Converse Counties through 145 PM MDT... At 101 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northwest of Little Medicine School, or 25 miles south of Casper, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Boxelder. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Converse County Lower Elevations; North Laramie Range
